page.title: 03RELIGION
page.content: Aslockton Church is in the Cranmer Group of Parishes.It is one of the biggest of the six churches.The Cranmer Group caters for Anglican and Methodist religions.The Anglicans and Methodists both use the Aslockton Church.Aslockton Church is part of the Southwell Dioscese,which is made up of 224 parishes.At the head is the Bishop.Aslockton Parish has a population of 1000 people.It is quite a small parish in comparison to other parishes.There is a thriving Sunday School with 45 children on the register.35 of these are regular attenders. Less people attend the services than they used to.This is due to the change of life style and other attractions. A confirmation service is held every other year.9 people were confirmed in 1985.Generally these people are over the age of 11.
